com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.server.adapter

Class CachedPrivileges

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.server.adapter.CachedPrivileges
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Privileges

    public class CachedPrivileges
extends Object
implements Privileges
    The CachedPrivileges is a cache for privileges. It is filled while check time to prevent the integration reaching an illegal state because of reconfigured privileges.

      • hasRunTermHarvesting

        public boolean hasRunTermHarvesting()
        Specified by:
        hasRunTermHarvesting in interface Privileges
        Returns:
        true, if the user is allowed to run a term harvesting.
        You have to check also RuleSetCapabilities.isTermHarvestingAvailable().

      • hasSubmitDictionaryEntry

        public boolean hasSubmitDictionaryEntry()
        Specified by:
        hasSubmitDictionaryEntry in interface Privileges
        Returns:
        true, if the user is allowed to submit a new DictionaryEntry.
        Note: you also have to check which dictionaries are possible: ClientProperties.getAddToDictionaryDictionaries().

      • hasEditPluginSegmentation

        Specified by:

        Returns:
